author: Simon Difford
description: The lovechild of Douglas Ankrah's Pornstar Martini and Joaquín Simó's Naked & Famous. Fresh ripe (yet still a little tart passion fruit) sits alongside mezcal to jointly anchor this fruity, yet balanced, cocktail.
name: Naked & Infamous
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut a passion fruit in half and scoop the flesh and seeds form each half into shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
